logger.doc:description:
Logs input message
{loggerUid=Logger-IN, file=global_elements.xml, description='request received into flow', inboundProperties=#[message.inboundProperties], payload=#[payload] }

logger.message: {loggerUid=Logger-OUT, file=code2blog_first_successful_connector.xml, description='response sent out from flow', inboundProperties=#[message.inboundProperties], outboundProperties=#[message.outboundProperties], payload=#[payload] }
logger.doc:description:
Logs output message sent to consumer
{loggerUid=Logger-OUT, file=global_elements.xml, description='response sent out from flow', inboundProperties=#[message.inboundProperties], outboundProperties=#[message.outboundProperties], payload=#[payload] }
